segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman looks while the sink is flooding the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just polishing that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already soaking her shoes, but she doesn’t react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just ignoring it or really doesn’t see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky right behind her, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is the most bizarre thing I’ve ever seen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to slip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery, and she’s still standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t know whether to laugh or yell at her to wake up.
segments.speaker: PAR
